title: [Large-scale] Clicker-based Formative Assessment Strategies for Advanced Reasoning Skills in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and clinical case analysis experience
context.additional_context: Program combining real-time interaction via smartphone-based classroom response systems with offline case studies

learning_goals: Learners can derive evidence-based nursing intervention strategies with 80% accuracy by analyzing real clinical scenarios
Through clicker formative assessments, learners can reconstruct their thinking processes by correcting reasoning errors three or more times during peer feedback
Learners can apply advanced critical thinking skills to complex patient case studies to establish priority-based nursing plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
